Text:
Thanks for Ed Schultz!  He's no longer on weeknights on MS-NBC as of March 15, but starting next month he will have a Saturday / Sunday slot on the same network but for 2 hours instead of one.

Meanwhile the radio show continues!  Hope you can bring us that more often.

I'll try, but in all likelihood it won't be as frequent as the other two. Ed's time slot even at 9 am isn't very convenient for me. It's probably why I've never uploaded Stephanie. 

I don't want to promise anything though.. But I'll see what I can do. btw, Unless Ed can get more downloads than Randi or Thom, I don't think it's worth switching.
Yes, now that you mention it when I used to upload Ed Schultz when I used to subscribe to his podcast I had the same problem.....
